body:
Is this the masterpiece I have been looking for all this time?

Yes. It is.
Finally after so long i found this again.Gud gem right here.

Technically its not based off this, it builds off it. Not that I mind, I've always wondered why Minamoto Jin decided to switch gears and continue on with this in a non-h formula. One thing is for sure those non-h doujins are possible some of the best abyssal/shipgirl alliance scenarios I've seen produced, it also doesn't hurt that Minamoto Jin's art style fits perfectly.
There are actually non-h comics based on this one and so far they're definitely hilarious.
